help-file.title: FARSEE
help-file.content:
Syntax: look <direction> Area of effect: <self> Aggressive: No Cumulative: No Duration: Dependent on proficiency of caster Type of spell: Enchantment
"Farsee" enables the caster to look into an adjacent room, as if the caster were actually there, but without the corresponding risks.
This can also be an innate ability.
